title: Accounts of Sexual Harassment Within the Washington Franchise, Plus a COVID-19 NFL Update | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Kevin Clark is joined by The Athletic’s Lindsay Jones to discuss last week’s report in The Washington Post in which several women described sexual harassment and verbal abuse within the Washington NFL franchise (1:35). Later, they discuss the outstanding issues regarding the NFL’s COVID-19 safety protocols for the upcoming season (25:52).
Host: Kevin Clark
Guest: Lindsay Jones


Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
